name: Fartbutt
description:
My entry for Day[9]'s  DK30. https://day9.tv/dk30

An annoying game inspired by 'Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy' in which you play as a humble butt.

NOTE:
Some shaders don't seem to work in the web version. Use the download version for best experience.

Version history:

  • Alpha 9000
    • initial release
  • Alpha 9001
    • added more effects
    • improved some colors
